languages.text: "Боюсь, скверна Архиврага способна жить в трещинах и сколах святых машин еще долгие годы. Убедите своих коллег внимательнее следить за их исчислениями".
"Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, скверна Архиврага способна жить в трещинах и сколах святых машин еще долгие годы. Убедите своих коллег внимательнее следить за их исчислениями".

traits.locale_text: "I fear the Archenemy's corruption is capable of living on in the cracks and nicks of the sacred machines for many years to come. Ensure that your colleagues keep a closer eye on their calculations."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I fear the Archenemy's corruption is capable of living on in the cracks and nicks of the sacred machines for many years to come. Ensure that your colleagues keep a closer eye on their calculations."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I fear the Archenemy's corruption is capable of living on in the cracks and nicks of the sacred machines for many years to come. Ensure that your colleagues keep a closer eye on their calculations."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I fear the Archenemy's corruption is capable of living on in the cracks and nicks of the sacred machines for many years to come. Ensure that your colleagues keep a closer eye on their calculations."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “金属无法保护你免受混沌大敌的腐化，记得让你的同伴彻底检查一下。”
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: “我担心，混沌大敌的腐化会在神圣机械的缝隙与裂痕中继续存续许多年，也可能会再度卷土重来。请确保你的同事多加留意这些机器的计算情况。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le métal ne vous protégera pas de la corruption du Grand Ennemi. Veillez donc à ce que vos collègues procèdent à une inspection méticuleuse. »
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne nous dit que la corruption du Grand Ennemi ne s'est pas infiltrée dans les machines sacrées par quelque interstice. Si c'est le cas, elle peut y subsister des années durant, alors vos collègues seraient sans doute bien avisés de surveiller leurs calculs de près. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Metall wird Euch nicht vor der Verderbnis des Erzfeindes schützen. Seht zu, dass Eure Kollegen bei ihren Inspektionen gründlich vorgehen."
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, die Korruption des Erzfeinds kann noch viele Jahre lang in den Rissen und Kratzern der heiligen Maschinen weiterleben. Stellt sicher, dass Eure Kollegen die Berechnungen genauer im Auge behalten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「金属では、渾沌の勢力の腐敗から身を守ることはできない。仲間に徹底して検査させてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力の腐敗が神聖なマシンのヒビや傷の中でこの先何年も生き続ける可能性を、俺は恐れている。お前の仲間には、マシンの計算に目を光らせてもらうぞ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El metal no le protegerá contra la corrupción del Archienemigo. Asegúrese de que sus colegas son concienzudos durante la inspección».
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que la corrupción del Archienemigo puede sobrevivir en las grietas y las muescas de las máquinas sagradas durante muchos años. Asegúrese de que sus colegas vigilan estrechamente sus cálculos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

languages.text: "Metal seni Şerbaşı'nın yozluğundan korumaz. Rahip arkadaşların bundan böyle denetimlerine büyük özen göstermeli."
languages.original_text: "Metal will not protect you from the Archenemy's corruption. Ensure that your colleagues are thorough in their inspections."

traits.locale_text: "Metal seni Şerbaşı'nın yozluğundan korumaz. Rahip arkadaşların bundan böyle denetimlerine büyük özen göstermeli."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
